src_original: yaḥ punarbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ śikṣāsāmīcīṃ samāpannaḥ śikṣāmapratyākhyāya śikṣādaurvalyamanāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ  maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevate antatastiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ evaṃrūpaṃ sthānamadhyāpadya  sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇaḥ aśākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt hataśrāmaṇyaṃ
tgt_original: 「若比丘！ 共比丘同戒，若不還戒，戒羸，不自悔，犯不淨行，乃至共畜生。 是比丘波羅夷，不共住。

src_original: yaḥ punarbhikṣurgrāmagatamaraṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātamādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena
tgt_original: 若在村落，若閑靜處，不與，盜心取。

src_original: rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyādvā saṃvadhrīyādvā pravāsayedvā evaṃ cainaṃ
tgt_original: 隨不與取法，若為王王大臣所捉，若殺、若縛、若驅出國：

src_original: vadet- tvaṃ bhoḥ puiruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si muḍho 'si steno 'sī tyevaṃrūpaṃ sthānamadhyāpadya
